00030 #include "AUD_SequencerReader.h"
00031 
00032 typedef std::list<AUD_Reference<AUD_SequencerHandle> >::iterator AUD_HandleIterator;
00033 typedef std::list<AUD_Reference<AUD_SequencerEntry> >::iterator AUD_EntryIterator;
00034 
00035 AUD_SequencerReader::AUD_SequencerReader(AUD_Reference<AUD_SequencerFactory> factory, bool quality) :
00036     m_position(0), m_device(factory->m_specs), m_factory(factory), m_status(0), m_entry_status(0)
00037 {
00038     m_device.setQuality(quality);
00039 }
00040 
00041 AUD_SequencerReader::~AUD_SequencerReader()
00042 {
00043 }
00044 
00045 bool AUD_SequencerReader::isSeekable() const
00046 {
00047     return true;
00048 }
00049 
00050 void AUD_SequencerReader::seek(int position)
00051 {
00052     if(position < 0)
00053         return;
00054 
00055     m_position = position;
00056 
00057     for(AUD_HandleIterator it = m_handles.begin(); it != m_handles.end(); it++)
00058     {
00059         (*it)->seek(position / m_factory->m_specs.rate);
00060     }
00061 }
00062 
00063 int AUD_SequencerReader::getLength() const
00064 {
00065     return -1;
00066 }
00067 
00068 int AUD_SequencerReader::getPosition() const
00069 {
00070     return m_position;
00071 }
00072 
00073 AUD_Specs AUD_SequencerReader::getSpecs() const
00074 {
00075     return m_factory->m_specs;
00076 }
00077 
00078 void AUD_SequencerReader::read(int& length, bool& eos, sample_t* buffer)
00079 {
00080     m_factory->lock();
00081 
00082     if(m_factory->m_status != m_status)
00083     {
00084         m_device.changeSpecs(m_factory->m_specs);
00085         m_device.setSpeedOfSound(m_factory->m_speed_of_sound);
00086         m_device.setDistanceModel(m_factory->m_distance_model);
00087         m_device.setDopplerFactor(m_factory->m_doppler_factor);
00088 
00089         m_status = m_factory->m_status;
00090     }
00091 
00092     if(m_factory->m_entry_status != m_entry_status)
00093     {
00094         std::list<AUD_Reference<AUD_SequencerHandle> > handles;
00095 
00096         AUD_HandleIterator hit = m_handles.begin();
00097         AUD_EntryIterator  eit = m_factory->m_entries.begin();
00098 
00099         int result;
00100         AUD_Reference<AUD_SequencerHandle> handle;
00101 
00102         while(hit != m_handles.end() && eit != m_factory->m_entries.end())
00103         {
00104             handle = *hit;
00105             AUD_Reference<AUD_SequencerEntry> entry = *eit;
00106 
00107             result = handle->compare(entry);
00108 
00109             if(result < 0)
00110             {
00111                 try
00112                 {
00113                     handle = new AUD_SequencerHandle(entry, m_device);
00114                     handles.push_front(handle);
00115                 }
00116                 catch(AUD_Exception&)
00117                 {
00118                 }
00119                 eit++;
00120             }
00121             else if(result == 0)
00122             {
00123                 handles.push_back(handle);
00124                 hit++;
00125                 eit++;
00126             }
00127             else
00128             {
00129                 handle->stop();
00130                 hit++;
00131             }
00132         }
00133 
00134         while(hit != m_handles.end())
00135         {
00136             (*hit)->stop();
00137             hit++;
00138         }
00139 
00140         while(eit != m_factory->m_entries.end())
00141         {
00142             try
00143             {
00144                 handle = new AUD_SequencerHandle(*eit, m_device);
00145                 handles.push_front(handle);
00146             }
00147             catch(AUD_Exception&)
00148             {
00149             }
00150             eit++;
00151         }
00152 
00153         m_handles = handles;
00154 
00155         m_entry_status = m_factory->m_entry_status;
00156     }
00157 
00158     AUD_Specs specs = m_factory->m_specs;
00159     int pos = 0;
00160     float time = float(m_position) / float(specs.rate);
00161     float volume, frame;
00162     int len, cfra;
00163     AUD_Vector3 v, v2;
00164     AUD_Quaternion q;
00165 
00166 
00167     while(pos < length)
00168     {
00169         frame = time * m_factory->m_fps;
00170         cfra = int(floor(frame));
00171 
00172         len = int(ceil((cfra + 1) / m_factory->m_fps * specs.rate)) - m_position;
00173         len = AUD_MIN(length - pos, len);
00174         len = AUD_MAX(len, 1);
00175 
00176         for(AUD_HandleIterator it = m_handles.begin(); it != m_handles.end(); it++)
00177         {
00178             (*it)->update(time, frame, m_factory->m_fps);
00179         }
00180 
00181         m_factory->m_volume.read(frame, &volume);
00182         if(m_factory->m_muted)
00183             volume = 0.0f;
00184         m_device.setVolume(volume);
00185 
00186         m_factory->m_orientation.read(frame, q.get());
00187         m_device.setListenerOrientation(q);
00188         m_factory->m_location.read(frame, v.get());
00189         m_device.setListenerLocation(v);
00190         m_factory->m_location.read(frame + 1, v2.get());
00191         v2 -= v;
00192         m_device.setListenerVelocity(v2 * m_factory->m_fps);
00193 
00194         m_device.read(reinterpret_cast<data_t*>(buffer + specs.channels * pos), len);
00195 
00196         pos += len;
00197         time += float(len) / float(specs.rate);
00198     }
00199 
00200     m_factory->unlock();
00201 
00202     m_position += length;
00203 
00204     eos = false;
00205 }
